body.p:
State of California
City & County of San Francisco

I, do solemnly Swear that I will faithfully, and to the best of my ability perform all the duties of Commissioner of the State of Kentucky, within the State of California agreeable to the Laws of the State of Kentucky -- So help me God --
Sworn and Subscribed before me this 18th day of August AD 1860 -- as witness my hand and official seal in the city and county of San Francicso. and State of California

F. J. Thibault
Commissioner for Kentucky
in California
